transcript.text:
￼














Template & Studio


Common Studio Settings
Canvas

1 min
this section includes the canvas settings canvas is the design area, where the customer can add different elements and create their design we have given certain canvas settings to help you customize the canvas for your customers zoom interval these intervals will help customers to get an enlarged view of their design, thus allowing then to view their design accurately and closely maximum canvas height & width set the height and width of the design area show a warning message when an element is moved out of the defined area this will give a warning to the customers whenever their design elements move out of the cut margin or safe margin the default position of the canvas you can set the default position of product canvas as the center of the screen or top left corner enable fit to screen this option will make the product canvas fit to screen however, this option disabled the zoom settings of the canvas
Did this page help you?
